parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The WebSocket URL to connect to (e.g., wss://echo.websocket.org). Required.

parameters.name: autoConnect
parameters.description: If true, the socket connects immediately on mount. Default: true.

parameters.name: maxRetries
parameters.description: Maximum number of reconnection attempts before giving up. Default: Infinity.

parameters.name: reconnectionInterval
parameters.description: Delay in milliseconds between reconnection attempts. Default: 3000.

parameters.name: onMessage
parameters.description: Callback triggered whenever a new message is successfully received and parsed.

parameters.name: onClose
parameters.description: Callback triggered when the connection is closed.

parameters.name: onError
parameters.description: Callback triggered when a connection error occurs.

returnValues.name: isConnected
returnValues.description: Reactive state indicating if the connection is currently open.

returnValues.name: message
returnValues.description: The most recently received and parsed message.

returnValues.name: messages
returnValues.description: An array containing the history of all messages received during the current session.

returnValues.name: error
returnValues.description: Contains the error message if a connection or parsing error occurs.

returnValues.name: send
returnValues.description: Function to transmit data through the socket.

returnValues.name: reconnect
returnValues.description: Manually forces a disconnection and immediate reconnection attempt.

returnValues.name: disconnect
returnValues.description: Manually closes the connection and cancels any pending reconnection timers.
